text.text: Welcome to Blockbench 4.2, the Panel Update!

features.title: Movable Panels!
features.text: Panels can now be snapped to the top or bottom of the interface, or float anywhere!

features.title: Texture Editing
features.text: More texture editing tools, like color adjustments, curves, and improved 2D texturing panel!

features.title: Seam Tool
features.text: New tools for better automatic mesh UV unwrapping!
